Segment.name: AOC
Segment.comment: To report offspring counts for the parent animal

Field.name: OffspringCountCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of offspring count collected for a specific animal

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: TestPeriodOrIntervalValue
Field.comment: Numeric value of period or interval signifying when a test event occurs

Field.name: UnitOfTimePeriodOrInterval
Field.comment: Code indicating the time period or interval

SyntaxNote.name: R0304
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of AOC03 or AOC04 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either AOC04 or AOC05 is present, then the other is required.
